mapper.update: update ${table} set type = #{board.type}, title = #{board.title}, writer = #{board.writer}, contents = #{board.contents}, date_update = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select board.id, board.type, board.title, board.writer, board.date_post, board.date_update, board.view, board.contents from ${table} board ORDER BY board.id DESC limit #{count}

select board.id, board.type, board.title, board.writer, board.date_post, board.date_update, board.view, board.contents, ( select count(*) from reply re where re.board = #{board} and re.postnum = board.id )as replyCount from ${table} board ORDER BY board.id DESC

select board.id, board.type, board.title, board.writer, board.date_post, board.date_update, board.view, board.contents, ( select count(*) from reply re where re.board = #{board} and re.postnum = board.id )as replyCount from ${table} board where board.type = #{type} and board.title like "%${likeTitle}%" and board.writer like "%${likeWriter}%" and board.contents like "%${likeContents}%" ORDER BY board.id DESC;
select board.id, board.type, board.title, board.writer, board.date_post, board.date_update, board.view, board.contents from ${table} board where board.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reply values (0, #{writer}, #{board}, #{postnum}, #{contents}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from reply where reply.board = #{board} and reply.postnum = #{postnum}
SELECT re.contents as 'contents', re.board as 'board', re.postnum as 'postNum' FROM reply re ORDER BY date_post DESC LIMIT 5;
